scripts.docker:run: export DOCKERID=$(docker build -q .) && docker run --name prometheus-mssql-exporter --rm -it -p 4000:4000 -e SERVER=$(docker inspect mssql | jq -r '.[].NetworkSettings.Networks.bridge.IPAddress') -e USERNAME=SA -e PASSWORD=qkD4x3yy -e DEBUG=app,db,metrics $DOCKERID ; docker image rm $DOCKERID
scripts.docker:run:published: export DOCKERID=awaragi/prometheus-mssql-exporter && docker run --name prometheus-mssql-exporter --rm -it -p 4000:4000 -e SERVER=$(docker inspect mssql | jq -r '.[].NetworkSettings.Networks.bridge.IPAddress') -e USERNAME=SA -e PASSWORD=qkD4x3yy -e DEBUG=app,db,metrics $DOCKERID ; docker image rm $DOCKERID
scripts.start: DEBUG=app,db,metrics SERVER=localhost USERNAME=SA PASSWORD=qkD4x3yy node src/index.js
scripts.start:verbose: DEBUG=app,db,metrics,queries SERVER=localhost USERNAME=SA PASSWORD=qkD4x3yy node src/index.js
scripts.test:mssql:2019: docker run --name mssql --rm -e ACCEPT_EULA=Y -e SA_PASSWORD=qkD4x3yy -p 1433:1433 --name mssql mcr.microsoft.com/mssql/server:2019-latest
scripts.test:mssql:2017: docker run --name mssql --rm -e ACCEPT_EULA=Y -e SA_PASSWORD=qkD4x3yy -p 1433:1433 --name mssql mcr.microsoft.com/mssql/server:2017-latest
